Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Provides a heart disease presumption for certain members employed as fire alarm dispatchers
Summary: Provides a heart disease presumption for members employed as a fire alarm dispatcher, a supervising fire alarm dispatcher level one or a supervising fire alarm dispatcher level two of a fire department in a city with a population of one million or more.
LawCode: Add ยง607-m, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to providing a heart disease presumption for certain members employed as fire alarm dispatchers
